200.description: Successfully returns the found resources, or an empty array if none were found.

head.summary: Retrieves a collection of resources without returning them.
head.description: Compare the returned ETag HTTP header with an earlier one to determine if the response has changed since it was fetched.

requestBody.description: The attributes and relationships of the resource to create.

201.description: The resource was successfully created, which resulted in additional changes. The newly created resource is returned.

204.description: The resource was successfully created, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

409.description: A resource type in the request body is incompatible.

422.description: Validation of the request body failed.

403.description: Client-generated IDs cannot be used at this endpoint.

get.summary: Retrieves an individual resource by its identifier.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the resource to retrieve.

head.summary: Retrieves an individual resource by its identifier without returning it.
head.description: Compare the returned ETag HTTP header with an earlier one to determine if the response has changed since it was fetched.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the resource to retrieve.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the resource to update.

requestBody.description: The attributes and relationships of the resource to update. Omitted fields are left unchanged.

200.description: The resource was successfully updated, which resulted in additional changes. The updated resource is returned.

204.description: The resource was successfully updated, which did not result in additional changes.

404.description: The resource or a related resource does not exist.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

409.description: A resource type or identifier in the request body is incompatible.

422.description: Validation of the request body failed.

delete.summary: Deletes an existing resource by its identifier.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the resource to delete.
